item.title: About
item.description: I am a rising senior majoring in computer science at University of Illinois at Urbana Champaign (UIUC). I will be an intern at the Illumination and Imaging Lab (IMIL) at the Robotics Institue, Carnegie Mellon University (CMU). I was an one-semester visiting student at National Taiwan University. My resarch interests are machine/deep learning, computer vision/graphics, and computational photography. Specifically, I currently focus more on 3D side of computer graphics/vision. I am from Taiwan and I love the mountain there.
